mapper.select: select id, name, avatar, sign from user where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

select id, name, avatar, sign from (select id, name, avatar, sign from user where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')) as a left join (select contact_id from contact where user_id = #{userId}) as b on id = contact_id where contact_id is null and id != #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, password, salt) values(#{user.userName}, #{user.userPwdEncoded}, #{user.salt})
mapper.select: select group_id from member where user_id = #{userId}
